intro: Ione thailandica, commonly known as Thai beauty, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its fragrant, white or pale pink flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub, reaching heights of up to 1 meter, with opposite, ovate leaves that have a slightly hairy texture. Its flowers bloom in clusters and are often used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits. Ione thailandica thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
